original_text: Always try very much to serve God in a way that makes him happy. Then he will accept you as a good worker that he can trust. You must teach God's true message correctly. Then you will have no reason to be ashamed of your work.
korean_text: 너는 진리의 말씀을 옳게 분별하며 부끄러울 것이 없는 일꾼으로 인정된 자로 자신을 하나님 앞에 드리기를 힘쓰라

sentences.original_text: Always try very much to serve God
sentences.korean_translation: 항상 하나님을 섬기기 위해 매우 노력하라

sentences.original_text: in a way that makes him happy
You must teach God's true message
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 하나님의 참된 메시지를 가르쳐야 한다

sentences.original_text: Then you will have no reason
to be ashamed of your work
